author: Anonymous Gear
title: Lecture 01/27
question:
Hi !
I am just wondering about the stub here,
I have been using false value for stub, so I am wording if I can put true value here?
it's the list example for tr 6
(define (contains-heartbreak? los) true) ; stub
thank you in advance!
student_answer: Yes, the value just has to be a boolean, so it doesn’t really matter whether you put true or false.
instructor_answer: Your classmate's right! You just need to make sure that your stub is following your signature :)
